components.description: A small pouch, somewhere between the size of a handbag, and a purse.
components.title: Pouch

description: A small pouch, somewhere between the size of a handbag, and a purse.
title: Pouch

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Clothing and accessories
emoji_net_data.definition: A small pouch, somewhere between the size of a handbag, and a purse. Clutch Bag was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name ‚Äú http://emojipedia.org/pouch/
emoji_net_data.name: clutch bag

bn:00084554v: To lift (something) and take it to another place; to transport (something) by lifting.
Move while supporting, either in a vehicle or in one's hands or on one's body
To lift and bring to somewhere else while supporting, either in a vehicle or on one's body; to transport by lifting.

bn:00091891v: Send by special mail that goes through diplomatic channels

bn:00000677n: Clothing that is worn or carried, but not part of your main clothing.
An article of clothing or equipment, in particular when used as an accessory.
Clothing that is worn or carried, but not part of your main clothing

bn:00006125n: Clothing is material used to cover parts of the human body for protection against the environment, for comfort and body modesty, and as personal decoration, often reflecting religious, cultural, and social customs.
Clothing is fiber and textile material worn on the body.
All coverings designed to be worn on a person's body.
Something that can be worn; an item of clothing.
A covering of or like clothing.
An act or instance of putting clothes on.
A covering designed to be worn on a person's body
Fiber and textile material worn on the body

bn:00071230n: The commodities purchased from storeswomen carrying home shopping didn't give me a second glance"
A retailer or shop is a business that presents a selection of goods or services and offers to sell them to customers for money or other goods.

bn:00063904n: A small or medium size container for holding or carrying things

bn:00007925n: A container used for carrying money and small personal items or accessories (especially by women)
A object used for carrying money and small personal items or accessories (especially by women).
A bag that is used typically by women to hold personal items
A handbag (small bag usually used by women for carrying various small personal items)
A small bag used by women (or sometimes by men) for carrying various small personal items.

A handbag, also purse, pocketbook or pouch in American English, is a handled medium-to-large bag that is often fashionably designed, typically used by women, to hold personal items such as wallet/coins, keys, mobile phone, cosmetics and jewelry, books/e-books, pen and paper, food and beverage such as a water bottle, pepper spray and other items for self-defence, tampons and other feminine hygiene products, contraceptives, tissues and infant care products, or a hairbrush.

bn:00020079n: A woman's strapless purse that is carried in the hand

bn:00007922n: A flexible container made of cloth, paper, plastic, etc.
A flexible container made of cloth, paper, plastic, leather, etc., to put something in or to carry away.
A flexible container with a single opening
A bag is a common tool in the form of a non-rigid container.
Simple tool in the form of a non-rigid container

apple_vendor_description: Apple's clutch bag emoji showcases a sophisticated and stylish accessory, depicted with a smooth, textured material in a chic color, often a deep red or black.  The design on Apple devices features realistic lighting that highlights its soft, rounded form and subtle folds, suggesting a luxurious and tactile feel.  This emoji is perfect for conveying fashion, elegance, or a night out, adding a touch of glamour to your messages with its polished Apple aesthetic.
